item.title: mCaptcha - to hell with captchas!
item.description: While working on Identity, I noticed some of the endpoints were computationally expensive. The target platform for Shuttlecraft systems are cheap computers such as Raspberry Pis so I learnt a new language and picked up a new web framework among many things, to make things go faster.
